div.h3: For Pre-K info call Kevin Hulbert 518-834-2800 ext. 3112

div.p: Per the Governor’s announcement today:the Pause in NY State will be extended to at least May 15th at this time. Importantly, the Governor’s office did confirm that his Pause extension also included schools, but it is still unclear whether the closure will be until May 15th or through May 15th.. I am confident that we will get additional clarification on that soon and will keep you posted on that or any additional changes as they are received.
Keep up the excellent work and stay strong! Thank you!

All the best,
Paul D. Savage II
Superintendent of Schools

div.div: The AuSable Valley Central School District covers over 300 square miles and represents a portion of three counties (Clinton, Essex and Franklin) in New York State. The District encompasses in whole and/or part of the Towns of AuSable, Black Brook, Chesterfield, Jay, Wilmington, Keene, Franklin, Peru and Willsboro.
